[vc_row][vc_column]

PET Preforms

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]WASHUN company upholds advanced design concepts and superb production technology, constantly researches the market, develops new products, adapts to different customer needs, and provides customers with one-stop solutions for the machinery required for PET bottles.[/vc_column_text]

Features

[vc_column_text]-BPA FREE

-ECO-Friendly Material

-DEHP (Plasticlzer) Free

-100% Virgin PET Resin

-Lower Cost than PC Bottle

-High transparency/High toughness

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4777″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
